title: Recieved girft from friend now they're gone
body: I recieved a few gifted skins  from a friend a few months ago i logged on recently and they're gone. He said he didn't take them back and still got charged for them. He said try to contact the support team.

replies.body: It looks like a couple of those gifts might have actually been refunded at some point, which would explain why you no longer have those skins. I can't be sure why the refund was issued, but I'd suggest reaching out to your friend to see if he remembers issuing a chargeback or refund, and if not, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing agents can take a closer look.
